data.title: Forvis Mazars
data.meta_description: NetSuite cloud ERP software can help your business scale from the ground up to the cloud & operate more efficiently. Learn more & request a demo today.
data.text:
NetSuite Benefits & Features

NetSuite was first to the cloud in 1998*. Now, cloud ERP software is widely seen as an improvement over on-premises systems, as teams can access critical business information from practically any device with an internet connection. Cloud technology also can reduce the need to purchase and maintain hardware, help lower IT costs, and lead to faster implementations.

More than 36,000 customers** worldwide of nearly every size use NetSuite.

Some of NetSuite’s key features include:

Best-in-Class Financials: NetSuite ERP can help you establish efficient finance and accounting processes and gain transparency into business operations. In addition to standard general ledger functionality, flexible workflow tools can streamline your processes and consolidate reporting for multiple business units. NetSuite’s Advanced Revenue Management feature can help your business comply with accounting standards and report financial results in a timely manner. It also can automate revenue forecasting, allocation, recognition, reclassification, and auditing through a configurable framework.

Accounts Receivable & Accounts Payable: Get end-to-end visibility into your receivables and payables with order-to-cash, i.e., sales order; billing; collection; and procure-to-pay, such as requisition, purchase order, invoice, and transaction management.

Inventory & Warehouse Management & Job Costing: NetSuite features inventory fulfillment and costing from factory to store with supply chain management capabilities. It also can include complete fixed asset lifecycle tracking and reporting from acquisition and depreciation to retirement. Accounting and reporting on project financials and profitability functionality also can be supported.

Sales & Customer Insights: NetSuite can help you streamline lead-to-cash processes. It can help improve sales performance through forecasting, upselling insights, and commission management. In addition, you can manage global sales, marketing, service, and partnerships remotely with NetSuite’s cloud applications.

Tailored to Your Business: See how NetSuite can be tailored to your business with low- and no-code customizations, custom record types and user interfaces, performance dashboards, and automated workflows. Integrate your business ecosystem with web services, APIs (REST and SOAP), pre-built connectors, and SuiteApps. You also can test new features in your sandbox and release preview environments. NetSuite’s automatic updates, including two major upgrades per year and ongoing minor upgrades throughout the year, can help you lower IT costs while following best practices around governance, risk, and compliance.

Forvis Mazars is a certified Oracle NetSuite partner. We can help you assess if NetSuite is right for you and what the process, costs, and timeline would be to implement it for your organization. We also can provide outsourcing services to help you access NetSuite and learn more about its full capabilities before purchasing your own module.

Our NetSuite technology consultants have decades of experience helping organizations assess technology platforms, design systems to streamline processes, and achieve their goals through digital transformation.

We bring a wealth of knowledge in implementing, integrating, and upgrading ERP tools along with providing a full suite of Technology Consulting services. Our extensive track record and approach to providing an Unmatched Client Experience® helps to differentiate us. We strive to help our clients solve their most challenging problems with innovative solutions that bring value and exceed their expectations. In addition, we respect your time and deliver projects promptly without compromising on thorough communication and quality.

When you’re ready to scale your business management processes from the ground up to the cloud, we’ll be ready to assist. Use the Contact Us form below to learn more or request a personalized demo.
